channel.title: Hyperion help
channel.description:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,428517.980.html i downloaded it i cant run the source it says [code]9.3.2010 13:37:29 org.hyperion.Server main INFO: Starting Hyperion... 9.3.2010 13:37:30 org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions... 9.3.2010 13:37:32 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 43595... 9.3.2010 13:37:32 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer bind INFO: Binding to port : 8080... 9.3.2010 13:37:32 org.hyperion.fileserver.FileServer start INFO: Ready 9.3.2010 13:37:34 org.hyperion.rs2.model.GameObjectDefinition init INFO: Loaded 25374 object definitions. 9.3.2010 13:37:34 org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server bind INFO: Binding to port : 43594... 9.3.2010 13:37:36 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading definitions... 9.3.2010 13:37:36 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loaded 14974 object definitions. 9.3.2010 13:37:36 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager load INFO: Loading map... 9.3.2010 13:37:36 org.hyperion.rs2.ScriptManager <init> INFO: Loading scripts... 9.3.2010 13:37:36 org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server start INFO: Waiting for pending background loading tasks... 9.3.2010 13:37:45 org.hyperion.Server main SEVERE: Error starting Hyperion. java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerGet(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.get(Unknown Source) at org.hyperion.util.BlockingExecutorService.waitForPendingTasks(BlockingExecutorService.java:50) at org.hyperion.rs2.RS2Server.start(RS2Server.java:74) at org.hyperion.Server.main(Server.java:36) Caused by: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at org.hyperion.rs2.model.Location.create(Location.java:40) at org.hyperion.cache.map.LandscapeParser.parse(LandscapeParser.java:83) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.ObjectManager.load(ObjectManager.java:53) at org.hyperion.rs2.model.World$2.call(World.java:125) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRun(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.run(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.runTask(Unknown Source) at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) 9.3.2010 13:37:45 org.hyperion.rs2.model.ItemDefinition init INFO: Loading definitions...[/code]
and i cant find a way to run the client/ i sound nooby but im new to hyperion

item.title: Hyperion help
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

  1. Remove the project files. 2. Make this a project in eclipse. 3. Run this with eclipse.
